name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.closePath
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.closePath() method of the Canvas 2D API attempts to add a straight line from the current point to the start of the current sub-path. If the shape has already been closed or has only one point, this function does nothing.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.closePath' in HTML Living Standard.
